summary: A follower based on my PS3 character, highly overpowered and wielding a daedric sword. My first mod so treat nicely.
descriptionHtml:
Are you a modder with a really overpowered god weapon? How many times have you yelled at your follower for being useless in a fight? to solve your problem: Here is joey an overpowered follower. This is my first mod and I am glad to say I am adding my PS3 character into the game he is highly overpowered, wearing blades armour, and wielding a daedric sword. You can find him in the drunken huntsmen in Whiterun where you can talk to him and say \"Follow me I need your help\" he will then be your follower. Please remember to get rid of any active followers you may have (ex. lydia) unless you have U.F.O (Ultamite Follower Overhaul)
I cannot guarantee that this mod will work with UFO.
If your still not convinced or you dont have much download/space on computer dont worry because the file is only 1 kb
author: Joey19367
